doc.previous: Han unification was an effort by the authors of Unicode and the Universal Character Set to map multiple character sets of the so called CJK languages Chinese Japanese Korean into a single set of unified characters and was completed for the purposes of Unicode in 1991 Unicode 1 0
doc.after: The Chinese script spread to Korea together with Buddhism from the 2nd century BC to 5th century AD hanja 50 The Japanese kanji were adopted for recording the Japanese language from the 5th century AD f
